mapper.select: SELECT distinct t.* FROM Tkd_Bcp t,M_BCPBk m WHERE t.BackDh=m.BackDh and (t.ThR = #{0} and BzStatus=0 and TlfzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0) or (t.ThR = #{0} and BzStatus=2) or (t.ThR = #{0} and TlfzrStatus=2) or (t.ThR = #{0} and ZjyStatus=2) or (t.ThR = #{0} and ZjldStatus=2) or (t.ThR = #{0} and KgStatus=2) or (t.ThR = #{0} and SlfzrStatus=2)
SELECT distinct c.* FROM Ckd_Bcp c,M_CPOut m WHERE c.FhR = #{0} AND c.OutDh=m.OutDh AND (KgStatus = 2 OR FzrStatus = 2 OR FzrStatus = 0 AND KgStatus = 0)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Bcp r,M_BCPIn m WHERE r.InDh=m.InDh ) t WHERE JhR = #{0} AND (BzStatus = 2 OR FzrStatus = 2 OR ZjyStatus = 2 OR ZjldStatus = 2 OR FzrStatus = 0 AND ZjyStatus = 0)

SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Bcp r,M_CPIn2 m WHERE JhR = #{0} AND r.InDh=m.InDh AND (BzStatus = 2 OR FlfzrStatus = 2 OR ZjyStatus = 2 OR ZjldStatus = 2 OR KgStatus = 2 OR LlfzrStatus = 2 OR FlfzrStatus = 0 AND ZjyStatus = 0)
SELECT distinct t.* FROM Tkd_Wl t,M_WLBk m WHERE ThR = #{0} AND t.BackDh=m.OutDh AND (BzStatus = 2 OR TlfzrStatus = 2 OR KgStatus = 2 OR SlfzrStatus = 2 OR TlfzrStatus = 0 AND SlfzrStatus = 0)

SELECT distinct c.* FROM Ckd_Wl c,M_WLOUT m WHERE LhR = #{0} AND c.OutDh=m.OutDh AND (KgStatus = 2 OR FlfzrStatus = 2 OR BzStatus = 2 OR LlfzrStatus = 2 OR KgStatus = 0 AND FlfzrStatus = 0 AND BzStatus = 0 AND LlfzrStatus = 0)
SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Wl r,M_WLIn m WHERE ShR = #{0} AND r.InDh=m.InDh AND (FzrStatus = 2 OR ZjyStatus = 2 OR ZjldStatus = 2 OR FzrStatus = 0 AND ZjyStatus = 0)
SELECT UserID,LoginName,TrueName,GroupName,RegTime FROM Hl_User u LEFT JOIN Hl_UserGroup ug ON u.GroupID=ug.GroupID ORDER BY RegTime DESC
SELECT UserID,TrueName,LoginName,RegTime,u.GroupID,GroupName,CheckQXGroup FROM Hl_User u LEFT JOIN Hl_UserGroup ug ON u.GroupID=ug.GroupID WHERE UserID=#{0}
mapper.update:
UPDATE Ckd_Bcp SET
KgID=#{kgID},
Kg=#{kg},
KgStatus=#{kgStatus},
FzrID=#{fzrID},
FhFzr=#{fhFzr},
FzrStatus=#{fzrStatus},
Remark=#{remark}
WHERE OutDh = #{outDh}
UPDATE M_BCPBk SET DWZL=#{dWZL},SHL=#{shl},remark=#{remark} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{qRCodeID}

UPDATE Tkd_Bcp SET
ThDw = #{thDw},
ShR=#{shR},
BzID=#{bzID},
Bz=#{bz},
BzStatus=#{bzStatus},
TlfzrID=#{tlfzrID},
ThFzr=#{thFzr},
TlfzrStatus=#{tlfzrStatus},
ZjyID=#{zjyID},
Zjy=#{zjy},
ZjyStatus=#{zjyStatus},
ZjldID=#{zjldID},
Zjld=#{zjld},
ZjldStatus=#{zjldStatus},
KgID=#{kgID},
Kg=#{kg},
KgStatus=#{kgStatus},
SlfzrID=#{slfzrID},
ShFzr=#{shFzr},
SlfzrStatus=#{slfzrStatus},
Remark=#{remark}
WHERE BackDh = #{backDh}

UPDATE Rkd_Bcp SET
JhDw = #{jhDw},
ShR=#{shR},
BzID=#{bzID},
Bz=#{bz},
BzStatus=#{bzStatus},
FzrID=#{fzrID},
Fzr=#{fzr},
FzrStatus=#{fzrStatus},
ZjyID=#{zjyID},
Zjy=#{zjy},
ZjyStatus=#{zjyStatus},
ZjldID=#{zjldID},
Zjld=#{zjld},
ZjldStatus=#{zjldStatus},
FlfzrID=#{flfzrID},
JhFzr=#{jhFzr},
FlfzrStatus=#{flfzrStatus},
KgID=#{kgID},
Kg=#{kg},
KgStatus=#{kgStatus},
LlfzrID=#{llfzrID},
ShFzr=#{shFzr},
LlfzrStatus=#{llfzrStatus},
Remark=#{remark}
WHERE InDh = #{inDh}
UPDATE M_WLBk SET DWZL=#{dWZL},SHL=#{shl} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{qRCodeID}
UPDATE M_WLOUT SET DWZL=#{dWZL},SHL=#{shl} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{qRCodeID}

UPDATE Ckd_Wl SET LhDw = #{lhDw}, KgID=#{kgID}, Kg=#{kg}, KgStatus=#{kgStatus}, FlfzrID=#{flfzrID}, FhFzr=#{fhFzr}, FlfzrStatus=#{flfzrStatus}, BzID=#{bzID}, Bz=#{bz}, BzStatus=#{bzStatus}, LlfzrID=#{llfzrID}, LhFzr=#{lhFzr}, LlfzrStatus=#{llfzrStatus}, Remark=#{remark} WHERE OutDh = #{outDh}
UPDATE M_CPIn2 SET ZJZT = #{2}, ZJY=#{1} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{0}
UPDATE M_CPIn SET ZJZT = #{2}, ZJY=#{1} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{0}
UPDATE M_BCPIn SET ZJZT = #{2}, ZJY=#{1} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{0}
UPDATE M_WLIn SET ZJZT = 1, ZJY=#{1} WHERE QRCode_ID = #{0}
mapper.select: SELECT M_CPIn2.CP_Name , M_CPIn2.YLPC , M_CPIn2.SCPC ,M_CPIn2.CP_Code, M_CPIn2.SC_Time , M_CPIn2.GG , Hl_Sort.Sort_Name ,M_CPIn2.DWZL, M_CPIn2.CZY ,M_CPIn2.DW FROM M_CPIn2 LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort on M_CPIn2.SortID = Hl_Sort.SortID WHERE M_CPIn2.QRCode_ID = #{0}

SELECT M_CPIn.CP_Name , M_CPIn.YLPC , M_CPIn.SCPC ,M_CPIn.CP_Code, M_CPIn.SC_Time , M_CPIn.GG , Pdt_Sort2.Sort_Name ,M_CPIn.DWZL, M_CPIn.CZY ,M_CPIn.DW FROM M_CPIn LEFT JOIN Pdt_Sort2 on M_CPIn.SortID = Pdt_Sort2.ID WHERE M_CPIn.QRCode_ID = #{0}

SELECT M_BCPIn.ProductName, M_BCPIn.SortID, M_BCPIn.YLPC , M_BCPIn.SCPC ,M_BCPIn.BCP_Code, M_BCPIn.SC_Time , M_BCPIn.GG , Pdt_Sort2.Sort_Name ,M_BCPIn.DWZL, M_BCPIn.CZY ,M_BCPIn.DW ,M_BCPIn.CheJian ,M_BCPIn.GX , M_BCPIn.Yl_1,M_BCPIn.Yl_2,M_BCPIn.Yl_3,M_BCPIn.Yl_4,M_BCPIn.Yl_5,M_BCPIn.Yl_6,M_BCPIn.Yl_7,M_BCPIn.Yl_8,M_BCPIn.Yl_9,M_BCPIn.Yl_10 FROM M_BCPIn LEFT JOIN Pdt_Sort2 on M_BCPIn.SortID = Pdt_Sort2.ID WHERE M_BCPIn.QRCode_ID = #{0}
SELECT * FROM Tkd_Bcp WHERE BackDh = #{0}
SELECT * FROM M_CPOut WHERE OutDh = #{0}

SELECT QRCode_ID as qRCodeID, CP_Code as wLCode, CP_Name as productName, GG as gG, c.SortID as sortID, s.SortName, YLPC as yLPC, SCPC as sCPC, SC_Time as time, Indh as inDh, DW as dW, DWZL as dWZL, CZY as cZY FROM M_CPIn2 c LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort s ON c.SortID = s.SortID WHERE Indh = #{0}
SELECT *,CP_Name AS productName FROM M_CPIn2 WHERE Indh = #{0}

SELECT QRCode_ID as qRCodeID, CP_Code as wLCode, CP_Name as productName, GG as gG, c.SortID as sortID, s.SortName, YLPC as yLPC, SCPC as sCPC, SC_Time as time, InDh as inDh, DW as dW, DWZL as dWZL, CZY as cZY,SHL as shl FROM M_CPIn c LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort s ON c.SortID = s.SortID WHERE InDh = #{0}

SELECT QRCode_ID as qRCodeID, CP_Code as wLCode, CP_Name as productName, GG as gG, c.SortID as sortID, s.SortName, YLPC as yLPC, SCPC as sCPC, SC_Time as time, InDh as inDh, DW as dW, DWZL as dWZL, CZY as cZY,SHL as shl FROM M_CPIn c LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort s ON c.SortID = s.SortID WHERE CPS2_QRCode = #{0}
SELECT *,CP_Name AS productName FROM M_CPIn WHERE InDh = #{0}
SELECT *,CP_Name AS productName FROM M_CPIn WHERE CPS2_QRCode = #{0} and QRCode_ID not in (SELECT QRCode_ID FROM M_CPS)

SELECT QRCode_ID as qRCodeID, BCP_Code as wLCode, ProductName as productName, GG as gG, b.SortID as sortID, s.SortName as sortName, YLPC as yLPC, SCPC as sCPC, SC_Time as time, CheJian as cheJian, GX as gx, CZY as czy, InDh as inDh, DW as dW, DWZL as dWZL,ZJZT as Zjzt,SHL as shl FROM M_BCPIn b LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort s ON b.SortID = s.SortID WHERE b.InDh = #{0}
SELECT * FROM Rkd_Bcp WHERE InDh = #{0}
SELECT * FROM Tkd_Wl WHERE BackDh = #{0}
SELECT * FROM Rkd_Wl WHERE InDh = #{0}

SELECT distinct t.* FROM Tkd_Bcp t,M_BCPBk m WHERE t.BackDh=m.BackDh
and (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=0 and TlfzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0) or (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and TlfzrStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjyStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjldStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and KgStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and SlfzrStatus=2)
and ZjyID=#{zjyID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0
and ZjldID=#{zjldID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0
and KgID=#{kgID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=1 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0
and (TlfzrID=#{tlfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0) OR (SlfzrID=#{slfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=1 and KgStatus=1 and SlfzrStatus=0)

SELECT distinct c.* FROM Ckd_Bcp c,M_CPOut m WHERE c.OutDh=m.OutDh
and (KgID = #{kgID} and KgStatus=0 and FzrStatus=0) or (KgID=#{kgID} and KgStatus=2) or (KgID=#{kgID} and FzrStatus=2)
and FzrID = #{fzrID} and KgStatus=1 and FzrStatus=0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Bcp r,M_BCPIn m WHERE r.InDh=m.InDh ) t WHERE 1=1
and (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=0 and FzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjyStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjldStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and FzrStatus=2)
and FzrID=#{fzrID} and BzStatus=1 and FzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0
and ZjyID=#{zjyID} and BzStatus=1 and FzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0
and ZjldID=#{zjldID} and BzStatus=1 and FzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=0

SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Bcp r,M_CPIn2 m WHERE r.InDh=m.InDh
and BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=0 and FlfzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0 or (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and FlfzrStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjyStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and ZjldStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and KgStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and LlfzrStatus=2)
and ZjyID=#{zjyID} and BzStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0
and ZjldID=#{zjldID} and BzStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0
and kgID=#{kgID} and BzStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=1 and KgStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0
and FlfzrID=#{flfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=0 and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0 or (LlfzrID=#{llfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=1 and KgStatus=1 and LlfzrStatus=0)

SELECT distinct t.* FROM Tkd_Wl t,M_WLBk m WHERE t.BackDh=m.OutDh
and (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=0 and TlfzrStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0) or (BzID=#{bzID} and BzStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and TlfzrStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and KgStatus=2) or (BzID=#{bzID} and SlfzrStatus=2)
and kgID=#{kgID} and BzStatus=0 and TlfzrStatus=0 and KgStatus=1 and SlfzrStatus=1
and (TlfzrID = #{tlfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=0 and KgStatus=0 and SlfzrStatus=0) or (SlfzrID = #{slfzrID} and BzStatus=1 and TlfzrStatus=1 and KgStatus=1 and SlfzrStatus=0)

SELECT distinct c.* FROM Ckd_Wl c,M_WLOUT m WHERE c.OutDh=m.OutDh
and (KgID = #{kgID} and KgStatus=0 and FlfzrStatus=0 and BzStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0) or (KgID = #{kgID} and KgStatus=2) or (KgID = #{kgID} and FlfzrStatus=2) or (KgID = #{kgID} and BzStatus=2) or (KgID = #{kgID} and LlfzrStatus=2)
and BzID = #{bzID} and KgStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and BzStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0
and (FlfzrID = #{flfzrID} and KgStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=0 and BzStatus=0 and LlfzrStatus=0) or (LlfzrID = #{llfzrID} and KgStatus=1 and FlfzrStatus=1 and BzStatus=1 and LlfzrStatus=0)

SELECT distinct r.* FROM Rkd_Wl r,M_WLIn m WHERE r.InDh=m.InDh
and (ZjyID=#{zjyID} and ZjyStatus=0 and ZjldStatus=0 and FzrStatus=0) or (ZjyID=#{zjyID} and ZjyStatus=2) or (ZjyID=#{zjyID} and ZjldStatus=2) or (ZjyID=#{zjyID} and FzrStatus=2)
and ZjldID=#{zjldID} and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=0 and FzrStatus=0
and FzrID=#{fzrID} and ZjyStatus=1 and ZjldStatus=1 and FzrStatus=0

SELECT * FROM M_CPIn WHERE QRCode_ID = #{0}

SELECT DISTINCT QRCode_ID , ProductName as name from M_BCPIn WHERE QRCode_ID in
#{qrCodeId}

SELECT DISTINCT QRCode_ID , ProductName as name from M_WLIn WHERE QRCode_ID in
#{qrCodeId}

SELECT b.*,u.TrueName zjy, case when r.ZjyStatus=1 and r.ZjldStatus=1 and r.BzStatus=1 and r.FzrStatus=1 then '合格' else '不合格' end jyzt FROM M_BCPIn b,Rkd_Bcp r,Hl_User u WHERE b.Indh=r.InDh and r.ZjyID=u.UserID and QRCode_ID = #{0}

SELECT M_WLIn.ProductName , M_WLIn.YLPC , M_WLIn.PCZL ,M_WLIn.WL_Code, M_WLIn.LL_Time , M_WLIn.GG , Hl_Sort.SortName , CASE WHEN M_WLS.DWZL IS NULL THEN M_WLIN.DWZL ELSE M_WLS.DWZL END DWZL, M_WLIn.CHD , M_WLIn.CZY ,M_WLIn.Unit,M_WLIn.Unit dw FROM M_WLIn LEFT JOIN M_WLS ON M_WLIn.QRCode_ID = M_WLS.QRCode_ID LEFT JOIN Hl_Sort on M_WLIn.SortID = Hl_Sort.SortID WHERE M_WLIn.QRCode_ID = #{0}

insert into M_CPS2
QRCode_ID,
CP_Name,
SortID,
CP_Code,
YLPC,
SCPC,
SC_Time,
DWZL,
CZY,
ZJY,

update M_CPIn set CP_Name=#{productName}, SortID=#{sortID}, SHL=#{shl}, CP_Code=#{cpCode}, YLPC=#{ylpc}, SCPC=#{scpc}, SC_Time=#{scTime}, DWZL=#{dwzl}, CZY=#{czy}, ZJY=#{zjy}, JYZT=#{jyzt}, DW=#{dw}, BZ=#{bz}, InDh=#{indh}, CPS2_QRCode=#{cPS2QRCode}, GG=#{gg}, Yl_1=#{yl1}, Yl_2=#{yl2}, Yl_3=#{yl3}, Yl_4=#{yl4}, Yl_5=#{yl5}, Yl_6=#{yl6}, Yl_7=#{yl7}, Yl_8=#{yl8}, Yl_9=#{yl9}, Yl_10=#{yl10} where QRCode_ID=#{qrCodeId}
